meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of cycloolefins.
meanings.sent1: The new plastic material is very cycloolefinic, making it ideal for use in electronics.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the unique properties of cycloolefinic compounds for potential applications in medicine.
meanings.sent3: The cycloolefinic material was so flexible that it started dancing on its own!
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was as cycloolefinic as a kaleidoscope, constantly changing and mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant colors of the artwork were as cycloolefinic as a rainbow after the rain, captivating everyone who saw it.

meanings.sent1: The chemical formula of the compound clearly indicates that it is cycloolefinic in nature.
meanings.sent2: The researchers identified the presence of a cycloolefinic structure in the organic molecule.
meanings.sent3: The cycloolefinic structure of the material seemed to give it a magical glow under the microscope.
meanings.sent4: The building's architecture was as cycloolefinic as a puzzle, with interconnected parts forming a beautiful whole.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the flower was as cycloolefinic as a secret garden, enticing bees and butterflies alike.
